mapper.select: SELECT hb.USER_UUID, hb.BROADCAST_SEQ, b.BROADCAST_TITLE, b.BROADCAST_IMAGE, p.PRODUCT_SEQ, p.PRODUCT_NM, p.PRODUCT_IMAGE, p.LIST_PRICE, b.CHANNEL_NM FROM TB_HISTORY_BROADCAST hb JOIN TB_BROADCAST b ON hb.BROADCAST_SEQ = b.BROADCAST_SEQ JOIN TB_BROADCAST_PRODUCT bp ON b.BROADCAST_SEQ = bp.BROADCAST_SEQ JOIN TB_PRODUCT p ON bp.PRODUCT_SEQ = p.PRODUCT_SEQ WHERE hb.USER_UUID = UUID_TO_BIN(#{userUuid}) ORDER BY hb.VIEWED_DATE DESC
